name: Blissful Wizard
description: Blissful Wizard by The Captain’s Connection is a potent hybrid strain that crosses Captain's Cookies and Girl Scout Cookies in a decadent fusion of lemon, lime, and cream flavors. With a soaring THC content that won this strain 1st place in the 2015 SoCal Cannabis Cup as a non-solvent hash, Blissful Wizard is the only healing potion you’ll need to eliminate stubborn aches, pains, nausea, and appetite loss. This flavorful hybrid helps conjure a happy headspace in which life’s stressors are obliterated by a blast of otherworldly euphoria.
descriptionPlain: Blissful Wizard by The Captain’s Connection is a potent hybrid strain that crosses Captain's Cookies and Girl Scout Cookies in a decadent fusion of lemon, lime, and cream flavors. With a soaring THC content that won this strain 1st place in the 2015 SoCal Cannabis Cup as a non-solvent hash, Blissful Wizard is the only healing potion you’ll need to eliminate stubborn aches, pains, nausea, and appetite loss. This flavorful hybrid helps conjure a happy headspace in which life’s stressors are obliterated by a blast of otherworldly euphoria.

highlightedReviews.text: My first time experience with "blissful Wizard." Although it's classified as a hybrid with 50% indica and 50% setiva, it's head-high happyness brought me to an energetic, social state where my anxiety was drained from my head and filled up with reason, understanding of my surroundings, willingness to learn, and a colorful insight. After inhaling the smoke I noticed a sweet, citrus flavor come on and it left a lemony and earthy flavor after the exhale (it's delicious). Soon, I became happy and wanted to take advantage of that moment so it brought me to the garden where my girlfriend and I began watering and I began picking vegetables and weeding- It was nice, it brought me closer to what was important to me and it helped me become comfortable with who I am by obliterating my idea of self worth and seeing through life's eyes in a much meaningful way. "Awareness of awareness"

Probably my favorite strain right now. The high is unlike any other and I have tried a lot of strains over the years. Whether you need to be productive or just contemplate life's mysteries this strain is amazing, very highly recommended but be careful it is potent!

articles.title: The 2015 SoCal Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, High Times hosted another Cannabis Cup in San Bernardino, where growers, breeders, extract artists, and other industry venders met head-to-head to show off their best creations. We hope you had a chance to visit Leafly and our co-sponsors Bhang Chocolates and CCIA at The Valencia for the Cup kick-off party. Additionally, we'd like to congratulate our booth buddies TLC (2nd Place Hybrid, Orange Cookies) and Honey Pot Bear (1st Place Topical, Honey Pot Bear Balm) for their victories this year!
For those who couldn’t be there for a front row view, here’s a list of the champions and their winning entries.
 
   Best Sativa Flower
1st Place | Mango Tango by Elemental Seeds
2nd Place | Loud Berry Flower by Loud Seeds SL
3rd Place | Tangie by Dr. Greenthumb
 
   Best Indica Flower
1st Place | Kosher Kush by Greenwolf LA and Kush Company
2nd Place | Lorax OG by Lorax Labs from CannaSutra Collective
3rd Place | Dr. K's Paris OG Kush by Cali Natural Collective
 
   Best Hybrid Flower
1st Place | Wellness OG from the W.E.E.D. in Studio City
2nd Place | Orange Cookies from TLC Collective
3rd Place | 2010 Grizzly Genetics from Grizzly Genetics and Patients Premium Collective
 
   Best CBD Flower
1st Place | V.C.D.C. from Moxie Seeds & Extracts
2nd Place | Vitamin CBD from Growers Guild
3rd Place | Vegan Buddha Milagro from Greenwolf LA and Vegan Buddha
 
   Best Sativa Concentrate
1st Place | Red Dragon from Dabblicious Extracts
2nd Place | Space Jack from Apothecary Collective and Imperial Extracts
3rd Place | Pineapple Lemonade from Greenwolf LA, Loud Pack Extractions, and Dabblicious
 
   Best Indica Concentrate
1st Place | Lemon Walker OG from Gold Coast Extracts
2nd Place | Lemon Walker OG from Gold Coast Collection
3rd Place | Crown OG from Pissing Excellence
 
   Best Hybrid Concentrate
1st Place | Lemon Bananas from Dabblicious Extracts
2nd Place | Banangie Kosher from Greenwolf LA and Dabblicious
3rd Place | Lemon Cookies from Moxie Seeds & Extracts
 
   Best CBD Concentrate
1st Place | Ringo's Gift from POP Naturals and WCHC
2nd Place | Ringo's Gift #3 from Greenwolf LA and Loud Pack Extracts
3rd Place | CBD Simple CO2 from CannaVest
 
   Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place | Blissful Wizard from Incognigrow Farms
2nd Place | Cookies and Cream Cubantech Drysift from Exotic Genetix
3rd Place | Gluekie Monster from Trichome Heavy Extracts and the Source Genetics
